# spec-kit Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-01-23

## Active Technologies

- Python 3.11+ (CLI), Bash 4.x+ (scripts), PowerShell 5.1+ (scripts) + `tomli` (Python 3.10 fallback) or `tomllib` (Python 3.11+ stdlib), existing `typer`, `rich` (001-custom-branch-templates)

## Project Structure

```text
src/
tests/
```

## Code Style

Python 3.11+ (CLI), Bash 4.x+ (scripts), PowerShell 5.1+ (scripts): Follow standard conventions
